title: 'God help us': Displaced Gazans who fled bombardment now face health crisis in a makeshift tent city
description: Women, children and the elderly are among the thousands of displaced people living in a huge, makeshift tent city sprawled across the desert in southern Gaza.

title: Guyana president calls Venezuela's Maduro an 'outlaw' in border dispute
description: The day before scheduled talks between them, Guayana President Mohamed Irfaan Ali declared Venezuela President Nicolás Maduro an "outlaw" who is "acting recklessly" in trying to wrest oil-rich land from Guyana in an NBC News interview.

title: Video shows child’s body carried through Gaza floodwater
description: Heavy rain and flooding is adding to the misery in Gaza as a battered and displaced population struggles to cope with the conditions.

title: Dengue cases break records in Americas amid warmer temperatures
description: There are over 4 million record cases of dengue across the Western Hemisphere as warmer temperatures extend mosquitos' habitat - and they're the main form of transmission.

title: Biden set to meet with families of Americans held hostage by Hamas
description: President Joe Biden will meet with the families of Americans being held hostage by Hamas since the terrorist attacks in Israel on Oct. 7.

title: U.S. and Israel increasingly isolated amid growing calls for a cease-fire
description: As the Israeli military expands its military operations in Gaza, NBC News’ Hala Gorani reports on the Israel Defense Forces latest offensive against Hamas and how the U.S. and Israel are becoming increasingly isolated internationally amid growing calls for a cease-fire.

title: Dozens injured as Kyiv comes under Russian bombardment for a second time this week
description: Russia's second missile assault on Kyiv this week injured at least 53 people, damaging homes and a children's hospital, Ukrainian officials said.

title: COP28 climate talks end in agreement to transition away from fossil fuels
description: COP28 President Sultan al-Jaber hailed a deal approved by almost 200 countries at the U.N. climate talks in Dubai as a "historic package" of measures.

title: Israeli military videos said to show strikes in Lebanon, Syria and West Bank
description: The Israeli military released videos said to show strikes on a Hezbollah launch post in Lebanon, Syrian army positions inside Syria and a raid on Jenin, in the occupied West Bank. NBC News could not independently verify the videos.

title: Biden says Israel is losing support amid ground offensive in Gaza
description: Israel is pushing ahead with its ground offensive in Gaza, with a U.S. official telling NBC News that Israel is pumping seawater in to destroy Hamas tunnels. President Biden said Israel is “starting to lose” support by “indiscriminate bombing.” NBC News’ Richard Engel has the latest.

title: Zelenskyy makes urgent plea to Congress for more aid in war against Russia
description: Ukraine’s President Zelenskyy is making an urgent plea to Congress for more aid. The Biden administration has been urging Congress to approve a $106 billion package. However, some Republicans say they want the White House to first agree to toughen policies at the US Southern border. NBC News’ Gabe Gutierrez reports.
